text: Trafficked to UK aged 5, kept as a slave for a decade and beaten every day : Teen breaks silence over harrowing upbringing among family she believed was her own EXCLUSIVE by DANIEL FOSTER Two weeks ago the horrific story of a girl who was trafficked to Britain for a life of domestic slavery at the age of five came to light. Speaking exclusively to Mail Online the girl, now 18, gives a heart - rending account of her lonely violence - fuelled upbringing in the North London home where she lived as a prisoner and was forced to endure almost daily beatings. She was so young when she was brought from Nigeria to the UK that she was convinced the couple who set her to work in their house were her parents.
